Text: I am seeding this file because the official site was getting pounded today with the new release being out.  After I was finally able to download it, I decided to seed it.

I'm sorry.  I should have put a little explanation.  VLC is a free multimedia player that I have used as a replacement for WMP for obout a year now.

From their site:
http://www.videolan.org/

VLC media player 0.8.6

    * It is a free cross-platform media player
    * It supports a large number of multimedia formats, without the need for additional codecs
    * It can also be used as a streaming server, with extended features (video on demand, on the fly transcoding, ...)
